sentences.en: Ability to envision and apply appropriate materials and graphics to footwear.
sentences.cn: 富想象力,并能将适当的材料及绘图应用于鞋类设计.

sentences.en: But put yourself in my position, just try to envision.
sentences.cn: 但是把你自己换到我的位置(想想), 请努力展望.

sentences.en: Envision Image Library source code integrity, and can be used directly.
sentences.cn: 设想图片库的源代码完整, 并可以直接使用.

sentences.en: Envision is an international Greentech enterprise backed up global private equity fund.
sentences.cn: 远景能源是一家由海外风险投资基金发起成立的国际型绿色能源企业.

sentences.en: Envision the conductor as an assemblage of driven , damped oscillators.
sentences.cn: 把导体看成是大量受迫阻尼振动的振子的集合.

sentences.en: Envision your success . Write about it . Then read that daily or weekly.
sentences.cn: 想象一下成功后的样子,写下来,每天读读.

sentences.en: Envision your success. about itThen read that daily or weekly.
sentences.cn: 想象自己成功的情形, 写下来,每日或每周阅读.

sentences.en: Host: I envision them as potential human repair kits.
sentences.cn: 主持人: 我们可以把它看作潜在的人类修复器.

sentences.en: However, I do envision her as having career success.
sentences.cn: 但我可展望她在事业上的成就.

sentences.en: I envisioned a future of educational excellence.
sentences.cn: 我展望了一个有着优质教育的未来。

sentences.en: Now close your eyes and simply envision color.
sentences.cn: 现在闭上眼睛,就想想各种颜色.

sentences.en: Servant leaders still do the things leaders do - direct, organize, envision.
sentences.cn: 仆人领导仍然做领导做的事 - 指挥, 组织, 构想.

sentences.en: Spot illustrations can help children envision themselves in reading process.
sentences.cn: 小插图可以帮助孩子在阅读时联想到画面.

sentences.en: They think of viruses that infect an organization from the outside. They envision hackers breaking into their information vaults.
sentences.cn: 他们考虑来自外部的感染公司的病毒, 他们设想黑客侵入到信息宝库中.

sentences.en: To envision title runs and banners and MVP trophies.
sentences.cn: 去幻想获得总冠军,总冠军旗帜,和MVP的奖.

sentences.en: We do not envision boards that collectively and independently set strategy.
sentences.cn: 我们并不是说董事会应当集体且独立地制定战略.

trans.tran_en: to imagine something that you think might happen in the future, especially something that you think will be good
to imagine something that you think might happen in the future, especially something that you think will be good
